snippet: It is unknown if a senior member of the Shabab militant group, believed to have helped plan the 2013 attack on the Westgate mall in Kenya, was killed.
abstract: United States military officials are assessing results of drone strike in Somalia that targeted Adan Garar and two other members of Shabab extremist group.

byline.original: By HELENE COOPER and ERIC SCHMITT
byline.contributor: Isma’il Kushkush contributed reporting from Nairobi, Kenya.

lead_paragraph: It is unknown if a senior member of the Shabab militant group, believed to have helped plan the 2013 attack on the Westgate mall in Kenya, was killed.

headline.main: U.S. Targets Shabab Unit in Somalia
headline.print_headline: U.S. Targets Shabab Unit in Somalia

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
